duties_responsibilities.duty: Servicing and managing client accounts, ensuring a minimum of 95% retention of Client Accounts through proactive client engagement.
Providing technical expertise in insurance coverage and products, staying updated on industry changes and developments.
Performing the USI New Business Process for new clients, including establishing a communication plan, reviewing policies, and managing pre-renewal activities for Premier clients.
Responding to underwriters' questions in a timely and professional manner and maintaining a high degree of accuracy in agency management and document systems.
Providing direction to clients in submitting first reports of claims and facilitating prompt response from carriers.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate. College degree preferred, but not required. Must hold state Property & Casualty insurance license. Hold an industry designation such as ARM, CIC, CPRIA, CPCU or expected to further industry knowledge through courses with intent to pursue an industry designation.
